content: Hi there. Seeking to get Zulip up and running on my Digital Ocean account. Anybody out there who's done this a million times and would be willing to let me pay them to set it up for me?
@Ted Pearlman Have you taken a look at https://marketplace.digitalocean.com/apps/zulip? The installation process is super straightforward.

Vishnu KS said:

Ted Pearlman Have you taken a look at https://marketplace.digitalocean.com/apps/zulip? The installation process is super straightforward.

Good suggestion, but nothing is straightforward enough for this pea brain. ;-)
Let us know if you face any issues :)
